mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_SITTER_APPLY_LICENSE_FILE (APPLY_FILE_NUMBER, APPLY_FILE_TITLE, APPLY_FILE_NAME, APPLY_FILE_UUID, APPLY_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, APPLY_NUMBER, SITTER_NUMBER) VALUES (SEQ_SITTER_APPLY_LICENSE.NEXTVAL, #{applyFileTite}, #{applyFileName}, #{applyFileUuId} , #{applyFileUploadPath}, #{applyNumber}, #{sitterNumber})
